title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte, NC, are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows, focusing on flexibility and impact.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies used by businesses to maximize their presence and attract customers at local events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks VP of Business Development in Charlotte
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development to expand employee ownership.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in the Charlotte business sector, focusing on employee ownership models.

title: Florence Airport Passenger Numbers Rise Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte, NC.
charlotte_impact: Shows the fluctuating dynamics of regional air travel and potential for new routes to Washington, D.C.

title: Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in Charlotte, NC
summary: Three women in North Carolina are accused of torturing and killing a girl, allegedly keeping her in a dog crate at a Charlotte home.
charlotte_impact: Reports a severe case of child abuse and violence, raising concerns about community safety and child welfare.

title: Homeowners Reassessing Selling Times as Market Shifts
summary: Homeowners are reconsidering when to sell their properties due to changing market conditions, according to Travis Buys Home in Charlotte, NC.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the evolving real estate market and its impact on homeowners' decisions in the Charlotte area.

title: Charlotte Residents Question High Natural Gas Bills
summary: Charlotte residents are expressing concern over significantly higher Piedmont Natural Gas bills, prompting questions about the increase.

title: Charlotte Announces New Director of Athletics

title: Fort Mill High School Student Dies Following Accident

title: Jefferson Lifts Stage 4 Water Emergency After Leak Repair
summary: Jefferson resolves its Stage 4 water emergency by fixing a leak near the wastewater plant, lifting severe restrictions.
charlotte_impact: Indicates successful resolution of a critical infrastructure issue, preventing drought surcharges and restoring normal water supply.

title: Two Charged in December Shooting at Occupied House in Monroe
